title: В России распространяется бэкдор для Android, атакующий бизнес
title_translated: In Russia, a backdoor for Android is spreading, attacking business
summary: A multifunctional backdoor Android.Backdoor.916.origin distributes malware to Android devices, performing malicious commands and intercepting data.

title: 微软Office漏洞可导致攻击者远程执行代码
title_translated: Microsoft Office's loophole can cause the assailant to remotely execute the code.
summary: Microsoft Office vulnerabilities allow remote code execution through document preview, affecting multiple versions of Microsoft Office and posing significant security risks to global business and individual users.

title: В России бот-трафик вырос в 1,9 раза, число устройств в ботнетах — в 5 раз
title_translated: In Russia, bot traffic increased 1.9 times, the number of devices in botnets – 5 times
summary: Malicious bot traffic increased globally, with Russia seeing a higher growth rate. Bots targeted telecom, finance, retail, entertainment, and logistics industries.

title: N-able N-Central Insecure Deserialization Vulnerability
summary: N-able N-Central contains an insecure deserialization vulnerability that could lead to command execution.

title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Resource Management Errors Vulnerability
title_translated: Microsoft Internet Explorer Resource Management Errors Vulnerability
summary: Microsoft Internet Explorer contains a memory corruption vulnerability that allows for remote code execution.

title: «Молния» против Max: в России готовят запуск нового госмессенджера
title_translated: “Lightning” against Max: Russia is preparing the launch of a new state messenger
summary: Russia is developing a new domestic messenger 'Lightning' to compete with Max from VK, offering features like AI-powered identification and encryption compliant with Russian standards.

title: Доля киберразведки в атаках выросла до 39% в первой половине 2025 года
title_translated: The share of cyber intelligence in attacks increased to 39% in the first half of 2025
summary: In the first half of 2025, almost 39% of all malicious activities on the Internet were related to cyber intelligence, with a focus on collecting data on vulnerabilities in web applications.

title: Платформа CICADA8 ETM теперь выявляет утечки кода и персональных данных
title_translated: CICADA8 ETM platform now detects code and personal data leaks
summary: CICADA8 Brand Protection module finds publicly available source codes, including passwords, keys, and tokens, in open sources like GitHub, GitLab, and Bitbucket.

title: Antd升级及兼容：从 v4 到 v5 实战全纪录
title_translated: Antd Upgrade and Compatibility: From v4 to v5 Operation Record
summary: The original Antd4 to Antd5 compatible field project has compatibility issues due to the use of Dayjs instead of Moment.js, requiring modifications and potential updates.

title: 溯源反制弥补丢失分数的方法；高频告警响应处理流程探讨 | FB甲方群话题讨论
title_translated: Ways to compensate for lost points in retroactive response; high frequency alert response process explored FB A cluster discussion
summary: The loss of points can be compensated through retroactive response to inevitable attacks, and deduction of points during Blue team defence. The emergency response process involves fast-tracking the source of attack and containment.
